Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Select Expand view in the wallet menu.
Expected Result:
A new tab opens.
The expanded extension view is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to open the Accounts options menu.
Expected Result: The accounts menu popover is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to Security & Privacy in the Settings menu.
Expected Result: The Security & privacy settings are displayed.

Test Steps: Ensure the Participate in MetaMetrics setting is enabled.
Navigate to the browsers extension page in another tab.
Inspect background.html using the browsers developer tools.
Expected Result: The browsers developer tools window opens.

Test Steps: Keep the background console open and head over to the wallet.
Proceed to General in the Settings menu.
Expected Result:
A request to Sentry is made in the networks tab under payload - https://api.segment.io/v1/batch.
The request payload is valid JSON and contains the name General Settings Page.
